overview:
Mike Chan is Co-founder and CEO of Dokkit, a smart calendar application that helps you more easily keep track of your interests.

Mike is also an Adjunct Professor at Georgetown University and was formerly the Senior Director of Strategic Marketing of the Washington Capitals / Monumental Sports and Entertainment, where he focused on revenue generation and customer engagement via digital media.

Mike has a B.S. from Lehigh University, an M.S. from Georgia Tech, and an MBA from NYU Stern, and is completely done with school.

Mike is a huge sports fan and roots for the NY Yankees, NY Giants, GT Yellow Jackets, and Washington Capitals. He’s also a huge fan of food, drink, and power napping, many times in that order.
